sys_hub_action_type_definition.description: Analyzes Configuration Item (CI) health by checking mandatory fields, validating relationships, identifying orphaned CIs, and calculating an overall data quality score (0-100). Provides actionable recommendations for improving CI data quality.
sys_hub_action_type_definition.name: Configuration Item Health Checker
